actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to permit individuals and their relatives to supplement medicaid payments for skilled nursing facility services and intermediate care facility services provided under title XIX of the Social Security Act.

summary.text: Permits individuals or their relatives to make supplementary payments for medical services provided by a skilled nursing facility or an intermediate care facility without losing payments for such services under the Medicaid Program of title XIX of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to permit individuals and their relatives to supplement medicaid payments for skilled nursing facility services and intermediate care facility services provided under title XIX of the Social Security Act.
